title: Powerful New Meme Shows EXACTLY Why Trump Is Leading
content:
IBD reports that a solid majority of Americans back Donald Trump’s ideas on immigration: When Donald Trump proposed mandatory deportation of illegal aliens, pundits and politicians on both sides of the political aisle were appalled. But on this issue it looks like Trump has the public on his side.
